oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Writers Night on the Ridge (1997)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tate, Annie; Tate, Sam; Wayne, Don; fund raising; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and yellow on white) announcing Writers Night on the Ridge featuring Annie Tate and Sam Tate, Don Wayne, Michelle McAfee, Mark Elliott, Gary Culley, and Larry Sandlin on November 15. Event benefits the Chestnut Grove Civic Club Scholarship Fund. Poster features a woodcut of a man reading a newspaper.
